name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-events-nodejs
title: Realtime meeting events
shortDescription: This Node.js sample demonstrates how a bot can receive real-time meeting events within Microsoft Teams, enhancing meeting interactivity.
longDescription: This sample showcases the capabilities of a bot in Microsoft Teams to capture real-time meeting events, such as when meetings start or participants join or leave. It includes features like adaptive cards and interaction with the app, designed for developers looking to enhance their meeting experiences.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing realtime meeting events

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
